thread.title: Ellen DeGeneres, Brie Larson, & Countless Others React To Donald Trump's Decision To Rescind Protections For Transgender Students
thread.title_full: Ellen DeGeneres, Brie Larson, & Countless Others React To Donald Trump's Decision To Rescind Protections For Transgender Students

author: Perez Hilton
title: Ellen DeGeneres, Brie Larson, & Countless Others React To Donald Trump's Decision To Rescind Protections For Transgender Students
text:
2/23/2017 7:42 AM ET | Filed under: Legal Matters • Politik • Emmy Rossum • Lance Bass • Donald Trump • Kathy Griffin • Ellen DeGeneres • Sad Sad • Ellen Page • Twitter • Transgender • Caitlyn Jenner • LGBT • Brie Larson 
Just when we thought Hollywood couldn't hate Donald Trump more… 
As we previously reported , on Wednesday, POTUS officially revoked federal protections for transgender students which allowed them to use the restrooms and/or changing rooms that matched their identified gender. Obviously, not long after this decision made headlines, celebrity allies for the LGBTQ community flocked to Twitter in order to SLAM the Trumpster for this civil rights violation. 
Video: Ellen Creates A New Ad For Trump's Mar-a-Lago Resort 
Specifically Ellen DeGeneres , Ellen Page , Brie Larson , and even Donald's Inauguration Day performer Jackie Evancho , ALL spoke out against this controversial decision. Be sure to ch-ch-check out their reactions on the matter for yourself (below)! 
Just seeing the news about removing laws protecting trans people. This isn’t about politics. It’s about human rights, and it’s not okay. — Ellen DeGeneres (@TheEllenShow) February 23, 2017 
We need to protect trans youth and stand up against this cruelty that hurts our kids. Support @Translifeline — Ellen Page (@EllenPage) February 22, 2017 
This is disgusting. This is unacceptable. I #StandWithGavin and every Trans person who deserve nothing less than protection and equality. https://t.co/IK5TO8nWQ8 — Brie Larson (@brielarson) February 23, 2017 
I am obviously disappointed in the @POTUS decision to send the #transgender bathroom issue to the states to decide. #sisterlove — jackie evancho (@jackieevancho) February 22, 2017 
. @realDonaldTrump u gave me the honor 2 sing at your inauguration. Pls give me & my sis the honor 2 meet with u 2 talk #transgender rghts ❤ — jackie evancho (@jackieevancho) February 23, 2017 
What an asshole! Trump administration withdraws federal protections on transgender bathrooms in schools @CNNPolitics https://t.co/HuazYmhe2a — Lance Bass (@LanceBass) February 23, 2017 
Standing with my Trans fam. This is not ok. This is an attack on all of us. I love you. https://t.co/oT1quwHJlI — Wilson Cruz (@wcruz73) February 23, 2017 
" @POTUS " you sure you're the best person to legislate the appropriate place for people to pee?
